description: Engineered for uneven, unpredictable trail terrain, the Injinji Trail Midweight Mini-Crew socks offer optimal fit, feel and protection in any shoe, hitting just above ankles to fully cover heels.
name: Trail Midweight Mini-Crew Socks

specs.value: 58% nylon / 39%   COOLMAX EcoMade polyester / 3% Lycra spandex
